title: Ares Pred Costly Loadout
contents: property | Capsule + NS X: | 22¥ | Incap: | Vigor - 4

title: Ares Pred Custom Rounds
contents: property | Capsule + NS X: | 22¥ | Incap: | Vigor - 4

title: Tracker Round
contents: bullet | Tracker rounds include an RFID tag inside the bullet.
bullet | If the target is damaged by the hit, the tracker round remains within the body of the target until it is removed.
bullet | If all damage is resisted, the round is imbedded in the target’s armor.

title: Bulldog
contents: bullet | morphing license plate, spoof chip, grid link override, rigger interface
bullet | anti-theft: lock and alert owner
bullet | Satellite : -5 noise due to distance.
bullet | oil slick, 5 uses, recharge for 50¥

title: Audio Enhancement
contents: text | Audio enhancement allows the user to hear a broader spectrum of frequencies, including high and low frequencies outside the normal metahuman audible spectrum. The user also experiences fine discrimination of nuances and can block out distracting background noise.

title: Flare Compensation
contents: text | This protects you from blinding flashes of light as well as simple glare. This modification  Negates the penalty  from flashing lights, like from a flash-pak.

title: Low-light vision
contents: text | This accessory allows you to ignore penalties for Dim or Dark illumination (but not Pitch Darkness).

title: Select Sound Filter (1)
contents: bullet | Can focus on specific sounds or patterns of sounds.
bullet | Includes speech, word, and sound pattern recognition.
bullet | Can load/search for a sound (such as the footsteps of a patrolling guard, a particular word, or the rotors of a distant helicopter).
bullet| Can trigger an alert sound occurs and play it back.

title: Thermographic Vision
contents: text | This enhancement enables vision in the infrared spectrum, enabling you to see heat patterns. It’s a very practical way to spot living beings in areas of total darkness, to check if a motor or machine has been running lately, and so on. This modification  halves Illumination penalties when attacking targets that radiate heat.

title: Vision Enhancement
contents: text | This sharpens a character’s vision at all ranges, providing visual acuity closer to that of the average hawk than that of the average metahuman.

title: Vision Magnification
contents: text | This zoom function digitally magnifies vision by up to fifty times, allowing distant targets to be seen clearly. This accessory allows you to read lips or read fine print up to a mile distant.

title: Bliss
contents: text  | A tranquilizing narcotic, bliss is an opiate synthesized from poppy plants.

title: Cram
contents: text | Cram users appear hyper-alert, almost to the point of paranoia. They react quickly, often without thought, and they’re prone to irrational outbursts. Other common side effects are jitteriness and fidgeting.

title: Deepweed
contents: text | Deepweed forces any magically active user to astrally perceive, even if the user is an adept without any astral perception ability. Role-playing the effects of deepweed may mean portraying someone who seems not completely “present.”

title: Jazz
contents: text | Taken from a single-dose inhaler. Makes people jumpy and hyper. Role-playing a jazz user means turning it up a notch, portraying someone with too much energy to burn—and too much energy to focus. When jazz wears off, the user is despondent.

title: Kamikaze
contents: text | Kamikaze users are nearcrazed, filled with a feeling of imperviousness and invincibility, exhibiting almost no regard for their own well-being.

title: Long Haul
contents: property | Effect: | no need to sleep
bullet | If kept awake,  +1 Fatigued, hallucinate
bullet | Second dose: stay awake 2 days, suffer Fatigue.
bullet | Third dose: single day of wakefulness, suffer Exhaustion.

title: Nitro
contents: property | Effect: | +1 Spi, +1 Str, cancel wound penalties
text | Nitro users feel infused with energy, suffer a diminished attention span, and talk incessantly (including to themselves)

title: Novacoke
contents: text | A stimulant derived from coca plants, novacoke is a highly addictive social drug.

title: Psyche
contents: text | Psyche users are simultaneously hyper-aware and detached, easily absorbed by detail and obsessive about certain facts or problems.

title: Zen
contents: text | A psychedelic hallucinogen, zen is popular among those looking to escape reality or seeking trance-like states. It won’t help you much when you’re on a run, unless you dose your opponents with it.

title: Biofeedback Filter
contents: text | 1 free reroll to soak Matrix damage

title: Browse
contents: text | 1 free reroll when Matrix searching

title: Edit
contents: text | 1 free reroll when editing a file

title: Exploit
contents: text | Reduce firewall of defender by 2

title: Overclock
contents: text |  One additional matrix action at no penalty

title: Swarm
contents: bullet | Add +1 for each drone in swarm to hit
bullet | All drones act as 1 drone

title: Oni
contents: bullet | Can run on all fours, loses weapons.

title: EMP Grenade
contents: property | Roll: | Every device in radius rolls Device Rating x 2 against a 4 difficulty.

property | Failure: | Items that fail the test burn out, have their data erased, and may even catch on fire or explode from the power surge. At the gamemaster’s discretion, even optical devices like commlinks will lose 3 points of Signal rating as their antennae are affected.

title: Flash-pak
contents: property | Blast: | Large| Effect: | -2 all actions
bullet | plugged in: 1 round per 10 seconds
bullet | induction: one charge per hour

title: Jammer Grenade (6)
contents: text | Banger special, modified from an old cell phone burner.
property | Recharge |  plugged in: 1 round per 5 min

title: NeuroStun-8 Gas Grenade
contents: property | Blast: | Large| Effect: | Incap 2d6 hrs

title: Smoke Grenade
contents: text | Blinds both regular and thermal vision

title: Zen Gas Grenade
contents: property | Blast: | Large| Effect: | -1 all action

title: Medkit
contents: bullet | Counts as kit for healing tests

title: Stim Patch (1)
contents: property | Repeated use: | Next stim patch within 24 hours requires that the user to roll to get the effect
property | Roll: | Vigor - #stim patches in 24 hours

title: Stim Patch (3)
contents: property | Repeated use: | Next stim patch within 24 hours requires that the user to roll to get the effect
property | Roll: | Vigor - #stim patches in 24 hours

title: Trauma Patch
contents: property | Caveat: | Must remain attached until patient has recovered one wound.

title: Ares Light Fire 75
contents: property | Silent: | -3, alert if move | Silent: | -3

title: Ares Predator VI
contents: property | Silent: | -2, alert if move | Silent: | -2

contents: property | Scope: | share, zoom, flare, thermo

contents: property | Silent: | -2, alert if move | Silent: | -2

title: Ingram Valiant
contents: property | Scope: | share, zoom, flare, low light

contents: property | Silent: | -2, alert if move | Silent: | -2
property | G- Scope: | 1245¥ | Roll: | V-2, Incap 2d6 hr
property | NS X: | 645¥ | Roll: | V-4, Incap 2d6 hr

title: RPK HMG
contents: property | Scope: | share, zoom, flare, low light

title: Armor Clothing
contents: property | Color: | free action | Color: | 1 action

title: Datachip
contents: text | Used to store data offline, a single datachip can hold an enormous quantity of data in a two-centimeter-by-six-centimeter chip. Datachips have no wireless capability, so you need to plug them into a universal data connector (found on any device) if you want to read or write to them.

title: Datatap
contents: text | Can tap into a cable w/o leaving a mark
text | Self destruct as a free action
bullet | Can leave cable intact, leaving only black dust behind

title: Jammer: Radial (4)
contents: text | Can set jammer not to interfere with devices/personas you designate

title: RFID Tags
contents: bullet | Can be found via the Matrix (Trace Icon)
bullet : Some can transmit GPS to Matrix

title: Secure Stealth Tags
contents: bullet | Cannot be erased with a tag eraser
bullet | Only transmit data in quick bursts
bullet | If implanted, removing requires a Healing check

title: Tag Eraser
contents: bullet | Needs to be within 5 mm
bullet | Recharges in 10s if plugged in

title: Endoscope
contents: text| This fiber-optic cable is at least one meter long, with the first twenty centimeters on either side made up of myomeric rope and an optical lens. It allows the user to look around corners, under door slits, or into narrow spaces. It is available in any number of lengths, although longer segments can be unwieldy

title: Gecko tape Gloves
contents: bullet | Gloves, knee pads, slip-on soles
text | Can neutralize adhesive as free action

title: Glue Solvent
contents: text| This spray can has enough solvent to dissolve about a square meter of fast-drying aerosol superglue.

title: Goggles
contents: property | Vision: | low light | Vision: | low light

title: Microtransceiver
contents: bullet | Send voice to other microtransceivers
bullet | Needs to be slaved to a better device

title: Miniwelder
contents: text | This portable device creates a small electric arc to melt metals, either to cut through metal or to weld it together. Its power supply allows it to operate for thirty minutes.

title: Monofilament Chainsaw
contents: text | The teeth on the chain of this portable motorized saw are topped with monofilament wire. Ideal for cutting through trees, doors, and other immovable objects.

title: Plasteel Restraints
contents: text| Modern plasteel restraints are flash-fused and remain in place until the subject is cut free.

title: Simrig
contents: text | This simsense recorder can record experience data (sensory and emotive) from you or whoever is wearing it. Simrig rigs are used to make most of the simsense chips sold on the market. You’ll need to have a working sim module (with the DNI interface) to make a recording.

title: Subvocal mic
contents: text | A skin-colored patch with a microphone attached with adhesive to your throat. It lets you communicate via subvocalized speech.

title: Trodes
contents: text | This electrode-and-ultrasound net gives you a DNI, or direct neural interface, connection. It can be any style of headband, hat, or headwear, along with being able to integrate into existing headwear, like a helmet or stylish fedora.

title: Electronic Paper
contents: text | A thin electronic sheet ranging from sticky note to poster size that can be folded or rolled up. It displays images, text, data, and video and can act as a touchscreen. It’s basically an ultrathin monitor. All electronic paper is wireless and can be written on or erased wirelessly.

title: Satellite link
contents: text | Limits noise due to distance to a maximum -5 penalty.

title: Survival Kit
contents: text | A rugged bag full of survival essentials. The bag includes
bullet | seven days’ worth of soy ration bars
bullet| fishing line and a hook

title: Survival Knife
contents: bullet | black blade, recharges in sun
bullet | blade lights up for 2 hours
property | Maps: | ARO of surroundings with GPS
